title: Drawing, "Textile Design: oval-shaped arrangment of daisies", 20th century
medium: Brush and orange and black gouache on white paper.
description: Orange daisies with black centers and black leaves placed on large grid, oval shaped design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: oval-shaped arrangment of daisies", 20th century.
20th century. Brush and orange and black gouache on white paper.. Gift of Max Wilner. 1942-87-1-c.
